Row.Text: Establish the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee

You have determined that it is the duty of your Citizens to be happy. To that end, you will establish the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee, a government body dedicated to enforcing your populace's fulfilment of this duty. Violation of this said duty will carry a penalty of the Citizen's choosing -- hanging, electrocution, immolation, and various other exciting activities are among the options.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The Vocaloids [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have discovered Civil Service [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Empire must be Very Unhappy (10 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness or more) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive HPMC Headquarters in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, which reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of Citizens by 20% and comes pre-filled with a Great Work of Music called "This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee," which has the same additional benefits as a Work created by a Synthetic Singer. However, it will also cause you to lose 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population from a randomly selected City every {2_Turns} turns.

The Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee is a building dedicated to keeping Vocaloid citizens happy. Any Vocaloids which are found slacking on this duty are dealt with in an efficient, if not exactly humane, manner.

-20% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from Population. A [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen from one of your Cities is lost at random after a set number of turns as long as you have this building.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be obtained by enacting a Decision.

Utau (stylized and most often referred to as UTAU) is a Japanese singing synthesizer application created by Ameya/Ayame. This program is similar to the Vocaloid software, with the difference that it is freeware instead of being released under third party licensing.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In Vocaloid culture, their status as freeware and their relative lack of popularity compared to Vocaloids have led to harsh prejudices towards them throughout history. The official endorsement of an UTAUloid Guild marks the beginning of the end of that discrimination.
May only be obtained by enacting a Decision.
This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee

The Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee found a group of [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in the City of {1_Name} who were not properly fulfilling their duty of being happy. This has been corrected! Hopefully, this makes the rest of the City happy!
